languages.text: "Вольному Торговцу не искупить своей вину перед Богом-Императором. Его душа спасется лишь в очищающем пламени!"

traits.locale_text: "Вольному Торговцу не искупить своей вину перед Богом-Императором. Его душа спасется лишь в очищающем пламени!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "The Rogue Trader cannot atone for his crimes before the God-Emperor. His soul will only be saved by the cleansing flames."
languages.original_text: "Вольному Торговцу не искупить своей вину перед Богом-Императором. Его душа спасется лишь в очищающем пламени!"

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader cannot atone for his sin before the God-Emperor. His soul will only be saved by the cleansing flames."

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader cannot atone for his crimes before the God-Emperor. His soul will only be saved by the cleansing flames."

languages.text: «El Comerciante Independiente no puede expiar sus crímenes ante los ojos del Dios Emperador. Solo las llamas purificadoras pueden salvar su alma ahora».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader cannot atone for his crimes before the God-Emperor. His soul will only be saved by the cleansing flames."

traits.locale_text: «El Comerciante Independiente no puede expiar su afrenta ante los ojos del Dios Emperador. Solo las llamas purificadoras pueden salvar su alma ahora».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “这位行商浪人已经无法在神皇面前赎清罪过了，只有净化的烈焰能拯救他的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader cannot atone for his crimes before the God-Emperor. His soul will only be saved by the cleansing flames."

traits.locale_text: “这位行商浪人已经无法在神皇面前赎清罪过了，只有净化的烈焰能拯救他的灵魂。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Le libre-marchand ne peut pas expier ses crimes devant l'Empereur-Dieu. Seules les flammes purificatrices sont capables de sauver son âme. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader cannot atone for his crimes before the God-Emperor. His soul will only be saved by the cleansing flames."

traits.locale_text: « Le libre-marchand ne peut pas expier ses actes devant l'Empereur-Dieu. Seules les flammes purificatrices sont capables de sauver son âme. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者は神帝陛下の前でその罪を償うことはできない。彼の魂は浄化の炎によってのみ救われるのだ」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader cannot atone for his crimes before the God-Emperor. His soul will only be saved by the cleansing flames."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者は神帝陛下の前でその罪を償うことはできない。彼の魂は浄化の炎によってのみ救われるのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Der Freihändler kann für seine Verbrechen vor dem Gottimperator keine Buße tun. Seine Seele kann nur durch die läuternden Flammen gerettet werden."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader cannot atone for his crimes before the God-Emperor. His soul will only be saved by the cleansing flames."

traits.locale_text: Der Freihändler kann für seine Vergehen vor dem Gottimperator keine Buße tun. Seine Seele kann nur durch die läuternden Flammen gerettet werden."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, suçlarının kefaretini Tanrı İmparator'un huzurunda ödeyemez. Ruhu, yalnızca arındıran alevlerle kurtulabilir."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader cannot atone for his crimes before the God-Emperor. His soul will only be saved by the cleansing flames."
